tvdb: Behind Jamal's back, Marissa goes to Stephen's rehearsal but is caught when Jamal arrives to return Ricky's lost wallet. When Marissa won't quit the band, Jamal walks out on her. Ian's stunned to see Kevin at Lucy's and is suspicious of his recovery. Kevin thanks Ian for being a friend to Lucy during his absence, but alone he's upset that Ian's gotten so close with Lucy. Livvie goes to Elizabeth's  to talk about Stephen, but Elizabeth thinks Livvie wants to steal him away. Livvie hides in the closet, then looks for proof of Caleb when Elizabeth leaves. Livvie's trapped in the closet when Elizabeth & Stephen return.
